content: With 15 years of experience, PaintMeDesign is committed to providing top-notch home improvement services in Los Angeles. We specialize in General Mounting, Furniture Assembly, and much more. Let's give your home the attention it deserves.

title: Furniture Assembly Made Easy
content: Struggling with flat-pack furniture? Our skilled team at PaintMeDesign is here to help. We provide professional furniture assembly services, ensuring your home is set up just the way you like it.

title.first: A Clean Home is a Happy Home

content: At PaintMeDesign, we believe that a clean home leads to a happier, healthier lifestyle. That's why we offer comprehensive cleaning services to keep your space sparkling and comfortable.
